text: Interstate 820 (I-820) is a loop of I-20 in Fort Worth, Texas, about long. The highway goes around the city, providing an easy route for travelers to bypass downtown Fort Worth and access the many suburbs in the area. The highway connects to many other major highways in the area, such as I-20, I-30, and I-35W. ==References== Category:Transport in Texas 820
title: Interstate 820
